definition: (of disparate elements) to mix in with one another/(of diverse groups of people) to live in the same area/to coexist
to inhabit a region (esp. ethnic group)/to congregate
(of a group of people) to live scattered over an area
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
Qiang ethnic group of northwestern Sichuan/surname Qiang
nomadic/to move about in search of pasture/to rove around as a nomad
